rootCause: helm-oci-install / _helm-oci-deploy forwarded chart arguments as chart=oci://..., so Helm reported invalid chart URL format as chart=chart=oci://... when using the documented key=value CLI pattern.
resolution: Helm-oci passes positional args; _helm-oci-deploy strips prefixes; CI dry run blocks chart= leaks.
references: just helm-oci-install release=dspace namespace=dspace chart=oci://ghcr.io/democratizedspace/charts/dspace values=docs/examples/dspace.values.dev.yaml,docs/examples/dspace.values.staging.yaml version_file=docs/apps/dspace.version default_tag=v3-latest
